wblut.hemesh

Class HE_Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HE_Element
      • wblut.hemesh.HE_MeshStructure
        • wblut.hemesh.HE_Mesh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WB_Geometry, WB_HasColor, WB_HasData, WB_Mesh
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HE_DynamicMesh

    public class HE_Mesh
extends HE_MeshStructure
implements WB_HasData, WB_HasColor, WB_Mesh
    Half-edge mesh data structure.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)

        public boolean collapseHalfedge(HE_Halfedge he)

        Parameters:
        he - the he
        Returns:
        true, if successful

        Returns:
        true, if successful
